name: irma-css
description: Styling to standardize the IRMA login flow and make it look pretty

scripts.clean: npm run clear && npm run fonts && npm run rebuild
scripts.svg-images: echo "// This file is auto-generated from the assets/images directory, so don't bother manually changing it." > src/variables/svg-images.scss; for file in assets/images/*; do [ -e "$file" ] || continue; svgo=`svgo "$file" -o -`; name=`basename "$file" .svg`; echo "\$svg-image-$name: '$svgo';" >> src/variables/svg-images.scss; done
scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-stylesheets" "npm run watch-fonts" "npm run watch-images" "npm run serve"
scripts.release: sass src/dist.scss dist/irma.css && uglifycss --output dist/irma.min.css dist/irma.css && cp -r assets/fonts dist/
